page.title: 05FARMING_PERRANPORTH.
page.content: I used to live on "Little Lambriggan Farm".There were pigs,cows,sheep and ducks on the farm.There were two farm houses made from one large one. There were eight fields,one of them had horses in it,but unfortunately, the horses both died. About seven people worked on the farm, everyone helping with the jobs.I was only three,but I used to help planting the vegetables.In the summer I go up and help in the same way. Sometimes now we get the tractor out and help pick up the potatoes.I get paid two pounds or three pounds if I work ever so hard. I used to have a pet adder,which had its poison taken out,but only my Gran- dad would touch it. There are not many farms in our town, but my Uncle owns "Wheal Jerrah Farm".
